resources.string: This application is designed to calculate the predicted amount of money that will be saved within a desired timeframe. It helps users easily determine the total savings accumulated over a specific period.\\n\\nThis application is developed for Assessment 1 in the Mobile Programming 1 course.\\n\\nCopyright © 2025–2026 Fathan Abdul Aziz.\\nAll rights reserved.
Just-Budgetin will calculate the target amount of money you will achieve on the desired day/month.
